title: Farmers as Agents of Change in Greening Agriculture: Challenges & Opportunities

tasks.task: Participate in a virtual event discussing farmers as agents of change in green transition and sustainable agriculture.
subtasks: Engage in welcoming the host and panelists.
Understand the importance of farmers in addressing global food demand and sustainability challenges.
Showcase Danish farming practices and technologies, such as biogas utilization and precision farming.
Highlight the role of technology, innovation, and cooperation in sustainable agriculture.
Discuss the importance of public policy, incentives, and R&D for farmers to adopt sustainable practices.
Address the role of smallholder farmers, youth, and women in the green transition.
Emphasize the need for farmer-friendly policies, credible signals, and inclusive partnerships on the global stage.
Share insights on climate-smart agriculture and policy recommendations from farmers, policymakers, and experts.
Facilitate questions from the audience and engage panelists in addressing key concerns and opportunities.
Summarize takeaways from the discussion and emphasize the critical role of farmers in achieving sustainable agriculture goals.
